languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g}, погруженный в чтение инфопластины, поднимает на вас взгляд. Его респираторный {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмент{/g} удален, вместо него нижнюю половину лица покрывает мертвенно белая искусственная плоть. Вы замечаете множество свежих аугментов, присосавшихся к его голове. Они внедрены в плоть без порядка, раны не обработаны и гноятся.{/n} "Я слышал твои шаги в пустоте... ты — фон Валанциус, не так ли?"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g}, погруженный в чтение инфопластины, поднимает на вас взгляд. Его респираторный {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмент{/g} удален, вместо него нижнюю половину лицу покрывает мертвенно белая искусственная плоть. Вы замечаете множество свежих аугментов, присосавшихся к его голове. Они внедрены в плоть без порядка, раны не обработаны и гноятся.{/n} "Я слышал твои шаги в пустоте... ты — Валанциус, не так ли?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} tears himself away from reading his data-slate and looks up at you. His respiratory {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} is missing — instead, the lower half of his face is covered in deathly pale artificial flesh. You take note of the multitude of fresh augmetics attached to his head. They seem to have been inserted haphazardly, and pus is seeping from the untreated wounds.{/n} "I heard your footsteps in the void... You are von Valancius, are you not?"
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g}, погруженный в чтение инфопластины, поднимает на вас взгляд. Вы замечаете множество свежих аугментов, присосавшихся к его голове. Они внедрены в плоть без порядка, раны не обработаны и гноятся.{/n} "Я слышал твои шаги в пустоте... ты — фон Валанциус, не так ли?"

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}はデータスレートの解読から自身を引き離してあなたを見た。彼の呼吸器の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}が見当たらない。その代わりに、彼の顔の下半分が死にそうに青ざめた人工筋肉で覆われている。あなたは彼の頭部に付いている多くの筋肉オーグメティックに注意を向ける。それらはやみくもに挿入されたように見え、膿が手当されていない傷から漏れ出ている。{/n}「ヴォイドの中であなたの足音を聞いた。あなたは、フォン・ヴァランシウスですね？」
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} tears himself away from reading his data-slate and looks up at you. His respiratory {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} is missing — instead, the lower half of his face is covered in deathly pale artificial flesh. You take note of the multitude of fresh augmetics attached to his head. They seem to have been inserted haphazardly, and pus is seeping from the untreated wounds.{/n} "I heard your footsteps in the void... You are von Valancius, are you not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}はデータスレートの解読から自身を引き離してあなたを見た。彼の呼吸器の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}が見当たらない。その代わりに、彼の顔の下半分が死にそうに青ざめた人工筋肉で覆われている。あなたは彼の頭部に付いている多くの筋肉オーグメティックに注意を向ける。それらはやみくもに挿入されたように見え、膿が手当されていない傷から漏れ出ている。{/n}「ヴォイドの中であなたの足音を聞いた。あなたは、フォン・ヴァランシウスですね？」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}眼前的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}从数据板上移开了视线，抬头看着你。他的呼吸器{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}不见了，下半张脸上覆盖着苍白的人造肉体，宛如死人一般。你注意到，他的头上装着各种各样的植入物，应该是不久之前才装上去的。这些植入物安装得乱七八糟，未经治疗的伤口中渗出了脓液。{/n}“我在虚空之中听到过你的脚步声……你就是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人，是吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} tears himself away from reading his data-slate and looks up at you. His respiratory {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} is missing — instead, the lower half of his face is covered in deathly pale artificial flesh. You take note of the multitude of fresh augmetics attached to his head. They seem to have been inserted haphazardly, and pus is seeping from the untreated wounds.{/n} "I heard your footsteps in the void... You are von Valancius, are you not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}从数据板上移开了视线，抬头看着你。他的呼吸器{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}不见了，下半张脸上覆盖着苍白的人造肉体，宛如死人一般。你注意到，他的头上装着各种各样的植入物，应该是不久之前才装上去的。这些植入物安装得乱七八糟，未经治疗的伤口中渗出了脓液。{/n}“我在虚空之中听到过你的脚步声……你就是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的人，是吧？”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} reißt sich von der Lektüre seines Datablocks los und blickt zu dir auf. Er hat keine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Atemaugmentation{/g} – stattdessen ist seine untere Gesichtshälfte mit todesbleichem künstlichen Fleisch bedeckt. Du bemerkst, dass an seinem Kopf zahlreiche Augmentationen frisch angebracht wurden. Das scheint ziemlich hastig durchgeführt worden zu sein, und aus den unbehandelten Wunden tritt Schleim aus.{/n} "Ich habe Eure Schritte in der Leere gehört ... Ihr seid von Valancius, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} tears himself away from reading his data-slate and looks up at you. His respiratory {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} is missing — instead, the lower half of his face is covered in deathly pale artificial flesh. You take note of the multitude of fresh augmetics attached to his head. They seem to have been inserted haphazardly, and pus is seeping from the untreated wounds.{/n} "I heard your footsteps in the void... You are von Valancius, are you not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriester{/g} reißt sich von der Lektüre seines Datablocks los und blickt zu dir auf. Er hat keine {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Atemaugmentation{/g} – stattdessen ist seine untere Gesichtshälfte mit todesbleichem künstlichen Fleisch bedeckt. Du bemerkst, dass an seinem Kopf zahlreiche Augmentationen frisch angebracht wurden. Das scheint ziemlich hastig durchgeführt worden zu sein, und aus den unbehandelten Wunden tritt Schleim aus.{/n} "Ich habe Eure Schritte in der Leere gehört ... Ihr seid von Valancius, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} s'arrache à la contemplation de sa plaque de données et lève le regard vers vous. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} respiratoire manque à l'appel. À la place, la partie inférieure de son visage est recouverte de chair artificielle d'une pâleur mortelle. Vous remarquez la multitude de nouveaux augmétiques implantés dans son crâne. Ils semblent avoir été insérés au petit bonheur la chance, et du pus suinte des plaies non traitées.{/n} « J'ai entendu le bruit de vos pas dans le vide... Vous êtes von Valancius, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} tears himself away from reading his data-slate and looks up at you. His respiratory {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} is missing — instead, the lower half of his face is covered in deathly pale artificial flesh. You take note of the multitude of fresh augmetics attached to his head. They seem to have been inserted haphazardly, and pus is seeping from the untreated wounds.{/n} "I heard your footsteps in the void... You are von Valancius, are you not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtre{/g} s'arrache à la contemplation de sa plaque de données et lève le regard vers vous. Son {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} respiratoire manque à l'appel. À la place, la partie inférieure de son visage est recouverte de chair artificielle d'une pâleur mortelle. Vous remarquez la multitude de nouveaux augmétiques implantés dans son crâne. Ils semblent avoir été insérés au petit bonheur la chance, et du pus suinte des plaies non traitées.{/n} « J'ai entendu le bruit de vos pas dans le vide... Vous êtes von Valancius, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} se obliga a sí mismo a dejar de leer la tablilla de datos y levanta la mirada hacia ti. Le falta el respirador {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g}; en su lugar, la mitad inferior de su rostro está cubierta por un injerto de carne artificial mortalmente pálida. Te fijas en la multitud de auméticos recientes que le cubren el cráneo. Parecen haberse implantado sin ningún cuidado, y le rezuma pus de las heridas que ni siquiera se ha dignado en curar.{/n} «He oído sus pasos en el vacío... Usted es von Valancius, ¿me equivoco?».
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} tears himself away from reading his data-slate and looks up at you. His respiratory {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} is missing — instead, the lower half of his face is covered in deathly pale artificial flesh. You take note of the multitude of fresh augmetics attached to his head. They seem to have been inserted haphazardly, and pus is seeping from the untreated wounds.{/n} "I heard your footsteps in the void... You are von Valancius, are you not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdote{/g} se obliga a sí mismo a dejar de leer la tablilla de datos y levanta la mirada hacia ti. Le falta el respirador {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g}; en su lugar, la mitad inferior de su rostro está cubierta por un injerto de carne artificial mortalmente pálida. Te fijas en la multitud de auméticos recientes que le cubren el cráneo. Parecen haberse implantado sin ningún cuidado, y le rezuma pus de las heridas que ni siquiera se ha dignado en curar.{/n} «He oído sus pasos en el vacío... Usted es von Valancius, ¿me equivoco?».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, okuduğu databeladan başını kaldırıp sana bakıyor. Solunum {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiğinden{/g} yoksun. Onun yerine yüzünün alt yarısı, ölü solgunluğundaki yapay bir etle kaplı. Başına takılmış birden fazla yeni ogmetiği fark ediyorsun. Gelişigüzel bir şekilde yerleştirilmişler, tedavi edilmemiş yaralarından irin sızıyor.{/n} "Uçsuzdaki adımlarını duydum. Sen von Valancius'sun, yanılıyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priest{/g} tears himself away from reading his data-slate and looks up at you. His respiratory {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} is missing — instead, the lower half of his face is covered in deathly pale artificial flesh. You take note of the multitude of fresh augmetics attached to his head. They seem to have been inserted haphazardly, and pus is seeping from the untreated wounds.{/n} "I heard your footsteps in the void... You are von Valancius, are you not?"

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}, okuduğu databelasından başını kaldırarak sana bakıyor. Solunum {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiği{/g} yerinde değil, onun yerine yüzünün alt yarısı, ölüm solgunluğundaki yapay bir etle kaplı. Başına takılmış birden fazla yeni ogmetiği fark ediyorsun. Gelişigüzel bir şekilde yerleştirilmişler ve tedavi edilmemiş yaralardan irin sızıyor.{/n} "Uçsuzdaki adımlarını duydum. Sen von Valancius'sun, yanılıyor muyum?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
